Lionel Richie is one of the most gifted writers I've ever heard. This collection blends his signature sound of his own songs, and his work with The Commodores. The songs range elegantly from Endless Love, to Hello, all the way back to Truly. This is a great album to help fall in love with their soulmate. I truly find Lionel Richie to be amazing.
